title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.10 - Parking restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.10 - Parking restricted

State Regulations

No person shall park a vehicle or permit the same to
remain halted on a public vehicular parking area, operational area, fuel
storage area, public landing area, public ramp and apron area, public passenger
ramp and apron area, public cargo ramp and apron area or public aircraft
parking and storage area, except at such places and for such periods of time as
may be prescribed or permitted by the airport operator. No aircraft refueling
vehicle shall be parked within 50 feet of a building or hangar other than a
refueling service-shop or within 15 feet of any other aircraft refueling
vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1274.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
